title: How to Make a Zombie Place on Roblox

steps.headline: Don't be afraid to use some free models.
steps.description: You shouldn't make the whole game out of them but some of them can be if you must.

steps.headline: Get a good, scary, sky box or one that goes through day and night.
steps.description: This will make the atmosphere a lot darker and creepier for players in your game.

steps.headline: Build an area where players can defend themselves.
steps.description: If they have no base they're going to find the game too hard and stop playing.

steps.headline: Put down a flooring of your choice.
steps.description: It can be grass if you want them fighting on a field or sand if they're fighting on a beach.

steps.headline: Put in good weapons!
steps.description: If you only put in one pistol your place won't get visited because it will be too boring. Instead put in Rocket launchers and shotguns as well with lots of other weapons. (Anchor your bricks or someone might shoot at the walls and explode them)

steps.headline: A zombie place on Roblox is never complete without its zombies!
steps.description: The scarier the better and the more the merrier. Just remember that the more you put in, the larger it will get.

steps.headline: Try to reduce lag as much as you can by putting in an anti-lag script.
steps.description: If you don't people might not be able to move around quickly so they'll leave because they keep getting killed. (Free models may make your place laggy)

steps.headline: Finally, update it as much as you can.
steps.description: People will visit regularly if they know a big update is coming! Maybe you could put in admin for your friends or an anti-teamkill script so players can't kill one another.

text: Don't be afraid to use some free models. You shouldn't make the whole game out of them but some of them can be if you must. Get a good, scary, sky box or one that goes through day and night. This will make the atmosphere a lot darker and creepier for players in your game. Build an area where players can defend themselves. If they have no base they're going to find the game too hard and stop playing. Put down a flooring of your choice. It can be grass if you want them fighting on a field or sand if they're fighting on a beach. Put in good weapons! If you only put in one pistol your place won't get visited because it will be too boring. Instead put in Rocket launchers and shotguns as well with lots of other weapons. (Anchor your bricks or someone might shoot at the walls and explode them) A zombie place on Roblox is never complete without its zombies! The scarier the better and the more the merrier. Just remember that the more you put in, the larger it will get. Try to reduce lag as much as you can by putting in an anti-lag script. If you don't people might not be able to move around quickly so they'll leave because they keep getting killed. (Free models may make your place laggy) Finally, update it as much as you can. People will visit regularly if they know a big update is coming! Maybe you could put in admin for your friends or an anti-teamkill script so players can't kill one another.
